Package cs35013s.view

Contains the functionality for the view aspect of the project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    A_Descriptor<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_MAPPER_ extends A_Mapper<?,?>,_RENDERER_ extends A_Renderer<?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>
    Defines the shared elements of a descriptor for an axis of a view in terms of the origin, size, gridline interval, and zoom step, as well as the appropriate mapper and renderer.
    A_DescriptorHorizontal<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<?,?,?,?>,_MAPPER_ extends A_Mapper<?,?>,_RENDERER_ extends A_Renderer<?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.A_LatitudeLongitude<?>>
    Defines the shared elements of a descriptor for a horizontal view, either longitude or latitude.
    A_Mapper<_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>,_AXIS_ extends cs35013s.datatype.I_WorldCoordinatable>
    Defines the shared elements of a mapper, which translates coordinates between a view and the world.
    A_Renderer<_RENDERER_ extends A_Renderer<?,?>,_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_Descriptor<?,?,?,?>>
    Defines the shared elements of a renderer, which renders the components of a view.
    A_View<_VIEW_ extends A_View<?,?>,_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<?,?,?,?>>
    Defines the shared elements of a view, where the horizontal axis is latitude or longitude, and the vertical axis is latitude or altitude, as defined by the subclasses.
    A_ViewVertical<_VIEW_ extends A_ViewVertical<?,?>,_DESCRIPTOR_ extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<?,?,?,?>>
    Defines the shared elements of a vertical view, where the vertical axis is altitude (increasing bottom to top), and the horizontal axis is latitude or longitude, as defined by the subclass.
    DescriptorHorizontalLatitude
    Defines a descriptor for a horizontal view representing latitude.
    DescriptorHorizontalLongitude
    Defines a descriptor for a horizontal view representing longitude.
    DescriptorVertical
    Defines a descriptor for a vertical view representing altitude.
    Desktop
    Defines a desktop that contains all view windows.
    MapperAltitude
    Defines a mapper that translates altitudes between a view and the world.
    MapperLatitude
    Defines a mapper that translates latitudes between a view and the world.
    MapperLongitude
    Defines a mapper that translates longitudes between a view and the world.
    RendererAltitude
    Defines a renderer that renders the altitude components of a view.
    RendererLatitude
    Defines a renderer that renders the latitude components of a view.
    RendererLongitude
    Defines a renderer that renders the longitude components of a view.
    ViewFront
    Defines a front view, with longitude on the horizontal axis (increasing right to left) and altitude on the vertical (increasing bottom to top).
    ViewSide
    Defines a front view, with latitude on the horizontal axis (increasing left to right) and altitude on the vertical (increasing bottom to top).
    ViewTop
    Defines a top view, with longitude on the horizontal axis (increasing right to left) and latitude on the vertical (increasing bottom to top).
    Window
    Defines the shared elements of a view of the world from a particular perspective.
    WindowManager
    Defines a manager that maintains all windows, which are simultaneous views of the model.

Package cs35013s.view Description

Contains the functionality for the view aspect of the project.
Author:
Dan Tappan
